rukus.text: Aey woh logo jo eman laye ho! Jummay kay din namaz ki azan di jaye to tum Allah kay ziker kay taraf dor paro aur khareed-o-farokht chor do. Yeh tumharay haq mein boht hi behtar hai agar tum jantay ho
Phir jab namaz ho chukay to zamin mein phel jao aur Allah ka fazal talash kero takay tum falah paa lo

Aur jab koi soda biktay dekhen ya koi tamasha nazar aajaye to uss ki taraf dortay jatay hain aur aap ko khara hi chor detay hain aap keh dijiye kay Allah kay pass jo hai woh khel aur tijarat say behtar hai. Aur Allah Taalaa behtareen rozi rasan hai
